name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior iOS Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in delivering high-performance applications in compliance-driven environments. Proficient in **iOS development**, adept in **MVVM**, **VIPER** architectures, and skilled in **RESTful** and **SOAP** APIs. Experienced in managing data interchange formats such as **JSON** and **XML**, and implementing security protocols like **OAuth** and **JWT**. 
Strong communication and problem-solving skills, with a proven track record of collaborating effectively across teams. Prior expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on capabilities in building and integrating sophisticated tech stacks using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Knowledgeable in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and experienced in implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines.

Designed and developed interactive and user-friendly RESTful APIs with **JSON** and **XML** data formats to facilitate seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.

Utilized secure authentication methods including **OAuth** and **JWT** to protect sensitive user information and ensure a secure environment within the applications.

Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, demonstrating excellent communication and problem-solving skills to gather requirements and deliver features efficiently.

Led the enhancement of application performance, resolving issues, and improving user experience with careful analysis and testing methodologies.

Participated in defining testing strategies and performing unit testing, integration testing, and E2E testing using **Cypress** and **Postman** to ensure reliability and quality.

Engaged in regular code reviews and mentoring junior developers, promoting best practices and adherence to OOP principles to strengthen team capabilities.

Adapted and executed Agile methodologies in project management to facilitate quick development cycles and efficient team collaboration, leading to the successful delivery of over **30** projects within strict deadlines.

Integrated third-party libraries and frameworks to enhance application functionality, focusing on maintaining a modular approach for future scalability and improvements.

Utilized analytics tools to gather user feedback and track application's performance, employing insights for continuous improvement and adaptation of app features.
